DOC.brief_summary: One paraffin block is routinely used for Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (Her2/neu) immunohistochemistry (IHC) assessment. Here, investigators investigated if picking two or multiple paraffin blocks for Her2/neu evaluation is an economical, efficient and practical method, which may reduce false-negativity of Her2/neu IHC assessment due to intratumoral heterogeneity.
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Her2/Neu Expression in Gastric Cancer With Dual or Multiple Tumor Tissue Paraffin Blocks
DOC.criteria: Age between 18 to 80; Received curative surgery with primary gastric adenocarcinoma; Did not receive any preoperative treatment.
